sequential.models.demo.DemoExperiment¶

class sequential.models.demo.DemoExperiment(*args, **kwargs)¶

Dummy class with all required experiment methods to run the sequential window without any device attached

finalize()¶

Needs to be overridden by child classes.

load_configuration(*args, **kwargs)¶

Loads the configuration file in YAML format.

Parameters:

filename (str) – full path to where the configuration file is located.

Raises:

FileNotFoundError – if the file does not exist.
